short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instaup APK extension will unfollow the Instagram users you mentioned automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unfollow specific Instagram accounts automatically by simply click on the etenion icon in your chrome brower and enter the list of usernames.

How to use the extension?

1. Enter your usernames, delay, and click "Start". 
2. All list users will be unfollowed one by one with the set delay.
3. Right-clicking an Instagram username and selecting "Add username to unfollow list" adds it to the list.
4. You don't need to input your login credentials anywhere. 
5. You must be logged in to Instagram on your browser.

Thanks for using our extension.
